Description: Fragmentary linen tunic, mounted on a modern, plain supporting cloth. Made of undyed linen, the tunic takes the form of a loose robe with wide sleeves and a simple slit for the neck, decorated with a thin band of purple wool. The colour is yellow-brown with darker staining in places.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), Burial of Bishop Timotheos
